summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help the federal government save money, address issues on our High Risk List and significantly improve government operations. This letter to the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation outlines 2 open recommendations that it should prioritize. For example, FDIC should work with other federal banking regulators to communicate appropriate uses of alternative data sources—such as rent or utility...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation
